name: places/ChIJd_CmwuZYwokRjWYDGd1JaxY
formattedAddress: 357 E 57th St, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 357 E 57th St, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text:
SWINDLER - DO NOT TRUST HIS WORD. I took my watch to be fitted by the owner, Daniel. I assured him four links needed to come off, but he guaranteed two would be enough. A "special tool" was required, so he had to ship it off and quoted me $25. Nearly 30 minutes passed, and my conscience pressured me to stop back in the store and go with four links removed, regardless of Daniel's recommendation of two. However, within those 30 minutes, a "delivery man" had already picked up my watch, and there was "no way" for him to contact him. Daniel assured me it would be okay if I needed more links and that he would not charge me.

The next day, I picked up my watch, and surprisingly, it did not fit and was too loose. Daniel gaslit me, saying that "only women wear tight watches" and he "cannot" remove any more links because removing the two was too much of a process. He then charged me $35!

Through discussing with him what happened, I found out there was no delivery man, and he had to break and resize my band with pliers - he was lazy and didn't want to resize my bracelet for a second time unless I pay another $35. It's a shame someone runs a business like this.

As you can see from the photos, my watch definitely “fits” - thanks Daniel!

originalText.text: Went in for some battery’s changed on a few old watches. Ended up with a new watch at a fantastic price. Daniel is an amazing jeweler who can and will handle anything you need, but he’s also so much more. Not only is he amazing knowledgeable about everything from vintage watches to current models, but he’s a great guy to talk to. I can’t say how much I recommend Daniel. If I could give him 6 stars, I would.

originalText.text: Daniel was very knowledgeable and very fast w/ watch resizing. We weren’t sure how loose to make the watch, but he made sure there was a proper fit. Great service

text.text: Daniel was very knowledgeable and very fast w/ watch resizing. We weren’t sure how loose to make the watch, but he made sure there was a proper fit. Great service

originalText.text: Daniel is great, very helpful + knowledgeable. He had my gold and diamond repairs done within 24 hours! I also love his inventory. Bought two beautiful gold necklaces from him for a great price. Highly Recommend!

text.text: Daniel is great, very helpful + knowledgeable. He had my gold and diamond repairs done within 24 hours! I also love his inventory. Bought two beautiful gold necklaces from him for a great price. Highly Recommend!

originalText.text: Quick, great service and great price :) I walked in to inquire about replacing a watch battery. In less than 10 minutes, he replaced the battery and set my watch! Will definitely come back again, recommend highly if you're in Midtown/Turtle Bay area.
